body:
There could be a problem in our swig wrapping w/ TF 3.6.

On Mon, Nov 6, 2017 at 12:29 PM, Sixun Ouyang <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I am using Python 3.6 with tensorflow_gpu 1.3 in Ubuntu 14 TSI, the same
> issue happens. By switching to Python 2.7, restoring model works.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
